It is not cotton, it's extremely plasticky feeling yet not stretchy. It is not flowy and has an awkward fit and the overall design is nothing like the image. It's not comfortable if you have a larger chest. It looks like a mix of scrubs and athleisurewear nothing like the picture or description. DO NOT GET THIS.

评论概述: Awesome shirt! If you have normal-large bust size up
评论详情: When wearing this, the triangle cup section often moves up and looks weird. I think if I got a bigger size it would be perfect. Material and quality are amazing!
Perfect size for me. This long sleeve top is super cute and looks like the pic! I get tons of compliments on it.
I ordered a size small and it fits perfectly. Love the top and the neckline. Super sexy and cute!

评论概述: Like It But It Doesn't Fit Right
评论详情: My wife really likes the material, nice and soft and smooth feeling. She likes the super long sleeves and bell cuffs. She likes the length. It fits kind of snug but is advertised as slim fitting so no problem. The problem comes in that it doesn't fit at all in the chest. The cup area is too small and the seam across the chest hits in the middle of her breasts. It just doesn't look right at all. If you are a smaller person and small chested it might work for you, but not in our case.

This shirt isn't worth the price in my opinion. It's cute, but does run small so size up 2 times. The material is thin but not see through and feels compressive in the arms.  In all it feels like a 3 dollar shirt from shein. It is cute but for over 10 dollars I don't think it's worth it.
It's way to loose and looks like a granny shirt bc of that I fit a small and it's just way to big I'm 5ft

High quality

Although the overall quality of this shirt relatively good, it definitely runs small. I am 5’6 and weigh 187 pounds and wear a size 42 C bra, and I ordered a size large (my regular size in shirts), and the shirt was very tight in all areas, especially along the bust line and arms.

Well, this shirt looks cute, but when I tried to put it on, it was way too small. I wear between medium and large shirts. I got the medium, and it was really small. I don't even think the large would have fit. I barely got it over my head but could not pull it down very far. It's too bad because the shirt looked nice out of the package.

This Women Fairy Grunge Aesthetic Long Sleeve V Neck Top is a stylish addition to my wardrobe! The slim fit is flattering, and the fabric is soft and comfortable. Perfect for creating that effortlessly cool streetwear look, it's versatile enough for casual outings or layering. Highly recommend for anyone who loves a blend of comfort and style!

I really like this shirt. It's not too thin, but it's very 90's. I remember this style way back then and love the fit. The sleeves are long and flared, so perfect for those of us who want to hide our hands. The neck V shape is low but when paired with a camisole or tank top- like the 90's- it's an awesome shirt. Size is true to fit.
this fits perfectly first of all it is so flattering. its soft and comfortable with some stretch.  i would recommend this shirt for the price

This blouse didn't match the photos at all. It's not ribbed cotton, and it's shorter in length than expected. As another reviewer pointed out, the material feels more like a swimsuit than a blouse. Very disappointing.  For reference, I’m 5'3½", 117 lbs, with a 29" waist and 35" hips, wearing small.

I ordered in Size Small in Color: I-Claret. The size was as expected but the fit was completely off. One side of front seams are sewn higher than the other side so the seam falls across the breast on one side. Too bad because the fabric was comfortable and a nice color.
I love everything about it
Gift for a friend, she fits perfectly. This t-shirt is exactly as described in the pictures, very good.
